detailed_issues.red_flag: The disclaimer states that the contract sets out the *minimum* employment standards applicable in ADGM pursuant to ADGM Employment Regulations of 2024, which may be amended from time to time without notification. While technically correct, it doesn't explicitly state that the contract *complies* with ADGM Employment Regulations. This could be interpreted as ambiguous.
detailed_issues.suggestion: Reword the disclaimer to explicitly state that the contract complies with the ADGM Employment Regulations of 2024, while acknowledging potential future amendments. For example: 'This Employment Contract complies with the ADGM Employment Regulations of 2024 (which may be amended from time to time without notification) and sets out the minimum employment standards applicable in ADGM.'
detailed_issues.compliant_clause: This Employment Contract complies with the ADGM Employment Regulations of 2024 (which may be amended from time to time without notification) and sets out the minimum employment standards applicable in ADGM.

recommendations: Immediate action required: Prepare critical missing documents
Important documents missing: Plan to prepare within 2-3 business days
next_steps: Focus on preparing Articles of Association and Memorandum of Association first
Schedule board/shareholder meetings for required resolutions
combination_issues: Single employment document detected - consider adding Employee Handbook or Employment Policy
